title: How to Fix a Broken Filter Cigarette

steps.title: Break off the filter end carefully.
steps.content: Break off the filter end carefully.

steps.title: Remove all the tobacco from the filter end.
steps.content: Remove all the tobacco from the filter end. This leaves behind a 1/8-inch recess [1] X Research source

steps.title: Carefully shove the other clean end of the cigarette into this recess using a twisting motion.
steps.content: Carefully shove the other clean end of the cigarette into this recess using a twisting motion. You should end up with a leak-proof seal. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Remember that the end (the part that you light up) looks broken, but it won't once you light it up.
steps.content: Remember that the end (the part that you light up) looks broken, but it won't once you light it up.
